mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, nickname, password, salt, avatar, achieve_value, school, login_ip, create_time, login_type, sex, signature) VALUES (#{userId}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{avatar}, #{achieveValue}, #{school}, #{loginIp}, #{createTime}, #{loginType}, #{sex}, #{signature})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nickname, avatar, achieve_value, school, login_ip, create_time, login_type, sex, signature FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
select user_id, nickname, password, salt, avatar, achieve_value, school, login_ip, create_time, login_type, sex, signature from user order by achieve_value desc limit 0, 10
